original: Bergulv, Tage, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 25/11/92 i Göteborg. G. 22 m. Lisa Berling. Barn: Anna-Lisa f. 35. — Utex. fr. CTH 17. Bitr. ing. v. centralhamnens nybyggn. i Gbg 17-18, posthav. ing. v. Malmö frihamnsbyggn. 18-19, arb :chef v. Skånska Cement-gjuteriets muddringsarb. i s. Sverige 20-21, grupping. f. väg- o. brobyggn. v. s. Sveriges stadsarb. 21-25, arb:-chef v. Malmö flygfält o. insp. ing. v. arb :lös’h :komm :s vägarb. i Skåne 25- 31, arb :chef v. Sotenkanalen 31-35, v. Malöströmmar 35, Barkarby flygfält 35-37. Arbetsch. v. vägförvaltn. i Gbgs o. Bohus 1. sed. 37. RVO.
translated: Bergulv, Tage, engineer, Gothenburg, b. 25/11/92 in Gothenburg. Married in 1922 to Lisa Berling. Children: Anna-Lisa b. 1935. Graduated from Chalmers University of Technology in 1917. Assistant engineer at the Central Harbor new construction project in Gothenburg 1917-1918, postal engineer at the Malmö Frihamn construction project 1918-1919, working as a manager for Skånska Cement-gjuteriets dredging work in southern Sweden 1920-1921, group manager for road and bridge construction in southern Sweden's city works department 1921-1925, working as a manager at Malmö Airport and inspector for road works for the Skåne County Council 1925-1931, working as a manager of the Soten Canal project 1931-1935, the Malöströmmar project in 1935, and the Barkarby Airport project from 1935-1937. Employed by the road administration in Gothenburg and Bohus county since January 1937. Received the Order of Vasa (RVO).

worksFor.name: Road Administration in Gothenburg and Bohus county
